about_the_game:
Will you help Hymble and Codee on their quest to save their home-world from a monstrous threat?
It’s Hymble Ventures time!

Join Our Community:

Come be part of our friendly group on our Discord server. Don't miss out on updates and fun discussions! Join our Discord

Game Features:


Unique Progress:
Keep an eye on Hymble’s wellbeing (she's hypersensitive) instead of traditional lives.



Special Powers:
Create zorb balls, boomerangs and so much more.




Creatures:
Discover bizarre creatures, divided into types of sense (sight, sound, smell, touch).



Narrative:
Follow a lighthearted tale through a stylised, comic book esque dialogue system



Collectibles:
Gather lip-shaped fruit, journal pages and special sense-enhancing fruit.

The Story:

Hymble is an optimistic young bug living in a small village of beings with supernatural gifts used for the common good. However, Hymble’s powers are different which isolates her from the village, and she is told she must learn the same powers as everyone else as declared by the overlords. Hymble refuses and sets off on a journey with her pet droid Codee, to seek powerful alien gods and gain approval of her powers before she has them taken away. But first, Hymble must aid the gods in safeguarding their homeworld from a dark, parasitic threat, and face challenges with her heightened sensory input.

name: Hymble Ventures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1240 v3 @ 3.40GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Xeon(R) CPU E3-1240 v3 @ 3.40GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse

short_description: Jump into a lighthearted 3D platforming adventure with Hymble and Codee. Embark on a quest of friendship and self-discovery, and save your village from a dark threat!
